cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 105 mi SSE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest, then northwest and north toward the coasts of South and North Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina / North Carolina border (Myrtle Beach–Cape Fear area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to south of South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: southeastern U.S. coast from Georgia northward to North Carolina (swells, rain, and gusty winds)
weather_observation.wind: Low (12%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts in outer rainbands possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Georgia coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands may drop up to 1–2 inches of rain over coastal Georgia.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous surf and rip currents possible along nearby beaches.
